Package org.zaproxy.zap.authentication

Class PostBasedAuthenticationMethodType.PostBasedAuthenticationMethod

java.lang.Object
org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.AuthenticationMethod
org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.PostBasedAuthenticationMethodType.PostBasedAuthenticationMethod
Direct Known Subclasses:
FormBasedAuthenticationMethodType.FormBasedAuthenticationMethod, JsonBasedAuthenticationMethodType.JsonBasedAuthenticationMethod
Enclosing class:
PostBasedAuthenticationMethodType
public abstract class PostBasedAuthenticationMethodType.PostBasedAuthenticationMethod extends AuthenticationMethod
An AuthenticationMethod where the Users are authenticated by POSTing the username and password.

The actual format of the POST body is defined by extending classes.

  • Constructor Details

    • PostBasedAuthenticationMethod

      public PostBasedAuthenticationMethod(String contentType, UnaryOperator<String> paramEncoder, PostBasedAuthenticationMethodType.PostBasedAuthenticationMethod authenticationMethod)
      Constructs a PostBasedAuthenticationMethod with the given data.
      Parameters:
      contentType - the value of the Content-Type, to be added to the authentication message.
      paramEncoder - the encoder to be used on the authentication credentials set in the POST body.
      authenticationMethod - the authentication method to copy from, might be null.

    • prepareRequestMessage

      protected HttpMessage prepareRequestMessage(UsernamePasswordAuthenticationCredentials credentials) throws org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException, HttpMalformedHeaderException, DatabaseException
      Prepares a request message, by filling the appropriate 'username' and 'password' fields in the request URI and the POST data, if any.
      Parameters:
      credentials - the credentials
      Returns:
      the HTTP message prepared for authentication
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException - if failed to create the request URI
      HttpMalformedHeaderException - if the constructed HTTP request is malformed
      DatabaseException - if an error occurred while reading the request from database

    • authenticate

      public WebSession authenticate(SessionManagementMethod sessionManagementMethod, AuthenticationCredentials credentials, User user) throws AuthenticationMethod.UnsupportedAuthenticationCredentialsException
      Description copied from class: AuthenticationMethod
      Performs an authentication in a web application, returning an authenticated.
      Specified by:
      authenticate in class AuthenticationMethod
      Parameters:
      sessionManagementMethod - the set up session management method is provided so it can be used, if needed, to automatically extract session information from Http Messages.
      credentials - the credentials
      user - the user to authenticate
      Returns:
      an authenticated web session
      Throws:
      AuthenticationMethod.UnsupportedAuthenticationCredentialsException - the unsupported authentication credentials exception WebSession.

    • getLoginRequestURL

      public String getLoginRequestURL()

    • setLoginRequest

      public void setLoginRequest(String url, String postData) throws Exception
      Sets the login request, based on a given url and, if needed, post data. If post data is provided, the assumed HTTP method is POST.

      If there is a SiteNode that matches the URL and post data (with the exception of the 'username' and 'password' parameters), it is marked as the 'Login' site node.

      Parameters:
      url - the url
      postData - the post data, or null if the request should be a GET one
      Throws:
      Exception - the exception
